title: Think of the future
creator_credit: Halas and Batchelor Cartoon Films and Central Office of Information for European Productivity Agency
brief_description: A cartoon contrasting improved modern conditions of work with the “good old days” when working and living conditions were in fact very much inferior. Only by increased production can the present high living standard be maintained and improved; to this end co-operation between workers and management is essential.
